Question
========
What was the purpose of the Michelson-Morley experiment?

Answerlist
----------
* To make a precise measurement of the speed of light.
* To verify that light is an electromagnetic wave.
* To establish that the Earth is the one true reference frame.
* To measure the Earth's motion relative to the ether.

Solution
========
The purpose of the Michelson-Morley experiment was to establish the existence of the ether and to measure the Earth's motion relative to the ether.
